pages.title: Cutting Boards
pages.text: To chop up your fresh vegetables and meat, you will need two tools: a cutting board and a kitchen knife. Cutting boards come in all wood types. Kitchen knives come in every tool tier except wood. You can place an item on the cutting board, and right click it with a knife to cut it. Items can be stacked on a cutting board. Better knives will cut more items at once.
